descriptionlist.description:
Installed to the iWidgets directory: /var/mobile/Library/iWidgets

Tweaks that you can use with:
iWidgets or XenHTML

This widget comes with 3 different sizes(Widget.plist) for iP5, iP6, iP6+.

Before applying the widget with iWidgets or XenHTML, choose your "Widget.plist" size and delete unwanted sizes if you want to.

Got questions? Contact me on:
Twitter: @Classicxii
Email: classicxii42@gmail.com

changelog.change:
Widget was recoded.

Switched to IS2 weather info, removed weather code.

Added "Options.plist" file and removed "Config.js" file.

Improved the touch events for music controls and the toggles.

Added more apps for Default Music Player. iHeartRadio, SiriusXM, Google Play Music, Youtube Music, Shazam, Amazon Music, TuneInRadio, Slacker Radio.

Removed my old built-in app drawer and added an option to open Instalauncher, AppDrawer, Fern tweaks and flashlight & app switcher is included aswell.

Removed Fadein/Fadeout animation when opening music player. For faster animation.

Change the bottombar color to bit darker
